WorkItem.Description: I don't see them for a fire mage available for selection. They are a BOE world drop which is usable in game.
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Grips of the Failed Immortal missing from database

Comments.Message: Go to the Item Browser and see if they actually are there but filtered out. If they aren't, add them.
The Default cache on the server right now has them
I added them via wowhead id, they weren't found in the list.

Not in there isn't the same thing as being filtered out. Do you see it in the Item Browser? If it is in the Item Browser, check to see that it has good source info, then check your Filters on the Gear>Hands chart. You can also put the name into the search box and it will jump down to it after pressing enter. Also, the Item Editor (editing the item itself) has a button to let you equip it.
It's in the cache but he can't see it most likely due to filters. Next version has a method where he'll be able to equip it regardless using Search Results.
